name: Lightshooter
description:
A shooter game where you shoot enemies and buy stuff with your own health, made in 3 hours for Trijam!

How to Play
  • While in game you can use WASD or Arrow Keys to move, and click to shoot enemies. The camera follows you around as you leave the screen. Kill all enemies to go to the shop.
  • While in the shop you can move and shoot in the same way. Press E to buy an item/go back to the game.
